name: @saekitominaga/customelements-button-media-sameplay
description: Simultaneous playback button for multiple audio / video.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.js -- brotlin compress dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.js -- terser dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.js -o dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.js.map',filename='ButtonMediaSamePlay.js',includeSources,url='ButtonMediaSamePlay.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.d.ts -- cpy dist/ButtonMediaSamePlay.d.ts dist --rename=ButtonMediaSamePlay.min.d.ts
